name: prueba-tecnica-nestjs-angular
description: This project is a fullstack technical technical test. The backend was built using NestJS, which is also able to serve the frontend app. The frontend was built using Angular and the PrimeNG library. A Sakai template for the latter was used.
author: José Amílcar González Miranda

scripts.start:full-app: npm --prefix ./frontend run build && npm --prefix ./backend run start:prod
